column5: Been fighting this flu bug for more than two weeks that's been going around and finally felt well enough to do something outdoors. So I suited up and cleared my driveway!!! Been a long cold winter already and it's no where near 1/2 over yet. Looking forward to the third week of February when I take off to Florida on a much needed 6 week vacation.  Here is what it looks like after spending a little bit of time clearing the driveway in the Arctic in January.  Need palm trees, rum and sun!!!!
Better work on that look before you try it on the ladies in Feb....

Better work on that look before you try it on the ladies in Feb....  What? I'm a rugged Northern he man!!! I could be on one of them Arctic reality shows y'all see on tee vee!!! The growth (or most of it will disappear before heading South)
Ya don't need to live in the Arctic to freeze your stach  Enjoy your vacation down south Dave, I'm sure your more than ready for some sun & warm temps after the winter you fellas are having up there.
